question: Who has been declared as the best male athlete in the 15th National Youth Athletics Championships 2018?
explanation: Punjab shot-putter Dhanvir Singh set the new record at the 15th National Youth Athletics Championships in Vadodara on July 23, 2018. He clinched gold medal by throwing 19.69m in his 5th attempt to crack the record of 19.34m set by Navtejdeep Singh in 2011. In the event, Dhanvir was declared as the best male athlete while Keralaâ€™s sprint hurdler Aparna Roy won the honours in the girls section. In women\'s 400 metre hurdles, Kerala\'s Priya won the gold and set the new record by crossing the finish line in a season-best time of 1:02.52 seconds. In doing so, she erased the previous meet record of 1:02.58 seconds set by P O Sanya in Bambolim in 2015. In women\'s 200 metre race, Kerala\'s Ancy Sojan won the gold in 24.91 seconds.  Haryana won the overall title with 165 points while Kerala (150) finished in the 2nd place.
